description: This file defines a React functional component named 'Modal' that renders a modal dialog box with optional title, action buttons, and children content.

methods.name: Modal({ open, title, onClose, children, actions })
methods.description: A React functional component that renders a modal dialog. It displays its children, title, and actions based on props, and can be dismissed via onClose.

ctags.name: Modal
ctags.pattern: /^export default function Modal({ open, title, onClose, children, actions }) {$/
